full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### 47419-239098-2 - Cafeteria Food Service for CBSA in Rigaud

* **Reference Number**: WS3620696571-Doc3723202114
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: October 27, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2022 (02:00 PM EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of cafeteria food services in Rigaud, Quebec, Canada.

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Tender Type**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14484641?extsite=MTQ0ODQ2NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14484641?extsite=MTQ0ODQ2NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 25, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 24, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery**: Rivière-Rouge, Quebec, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC)
* **Contact Name**: Corine Lavoie (Corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Note: Formatting made to improve readability. Translated text is preserved where possible, to maintain
